context_bundle.summary: GitLab CI/CD: Integrated DevOps platform with built-in CI/CD. Pipeline config in .gitlab-ci.yml. Key features: Auto DevOps, container registry, merge request pipelines, environments, review apps, SAST/DAST scanning. Runners execute jobs (shared, group, project-specific).

onboarding.quick_start: GitLab CI: 1) Create .gitlab-ci.yml in repo root, 2) Define stages (build, test, deploy), 3) Configure jobs with script/artifacts/rules, 4) Use shared runners or register your own, 5) Enable Auto DevOps for zero-config pipelines.

known_errors.cause: No available runners matching job tags
known_errors.solution: Check runner tags match job tags, or remove tags for shared runners
known_errors.prevention: Use shared runners for simple jobs, tag only when specific runner needed
